script_text:
The air is thick with the smell of ozone. LASER GRIDS—                 
             vibrant, humming webs of red light—crisscross the room,                
             shorted out by a bypass module sparking on the floor.                  
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             JAX (32) and MIRA (28) are waist-deep in chaos. STACKS OF              
             CASH are piled high. Six heavy DUFFEL BAGS sit engorged.               
                                                                                    
             Jax cinches the last bag shut. He checks his watch.                    
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 Time’s up. The silent alarm just                                   
                 pinged the precinct.                                               
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                       MIRA                                                         
                 Five seconds. I’m wiping the                                       
                 internal loop.                                                     
                                                                                    
             She rips a cable out. The vault door groans.                           
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                                                                                    
                 Move. Now.                                                         
                                                                                    
             Jax swings two bags over his shoulders. They bolt.
description: Jax and Mira are in a bank vault, surrounded by laser grids and stacks of cash. They must escape before the silent alarm is triggered.
continuity_notes: Laser Grids -> Exact match from Reference Catalog: Use Scene 1 Laser Grids | Bypass Module -> Exact match from Reference Catalog: Use a functional Bypass Module | Cash Stacks -> No exact match in Reference Catalog, but likely to be Cash ( generic noun): Verify Cash Stacks are consistent with previous scene | LASER GRIDS—vibrant, humming webs of red light -> shorted out by a bypass module sparking on the floor: Broken

flags.note: Physical risks like specialized movement (e.g. vaulting) and high-impact stunts.

script_text:
The lobby is a cavern of marble and shadow.                            
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             AT THE TELLER WINDOW                                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax vaults over the mahogany counter, sliding across the               
             polished wood. He drops the bags on the other side.                    
                                                                                    
             BY THE FRONT DOOR                                                      
                                                                                    
             Mira presses her back against the glass. Outside, blue and             
                                                                                    
             red lights pulse against the rain-slicked pavement.                    
                                                                                    
                       MIRA                                                         
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                 We have a problem. They beat the                                   
                 timer.
description: Jax vaults over mahogany counter, sliding across polished wood.
continuity_notes: marble -> Category BACKGROUND ACTORS: marble (Sc 1): Use Scene 1 Marble | mahogany counter -> Use generic noun and match with Category SET DRESSING: mahogany furniture (Sc 1): Use Scene 1 Mahogany Furniture | polished wood -> Use generic noun and match with Category BACKGROUND ACTORS: polished wood floor (Sc 1): Use Scene 1 Polished Wood Floor | bags -> dropped: They were placed on the other side of the counter. | glass at front door -> untouched: Mira is pressing her back against it, implying that it has not been affected physically.

flags.note: Weather effect: rain on the pavement

script_text:
The lobby is bathed in the strobe-light effect of police               
             cruisers. Jax and Mira crouch behind a marble pillar.                  
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 On three, we blow the mag-locks.                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax clicks a detonator. BOOM. The glass doors SHATTER.
description: Jax and Mira crouch behind a pillar, waiting to blow the mag-locks.
continuity_notes: police cruisers -> STACKS OF CASH (Sc 1): Use Scene 1 Stacks of Cash, but change lighting color to strobe-light effect | marble pillar -> LASER GRIDS (Sc 1) - Incorrect match: marble not mentioned in Ref Catalog. However, as a background element, it should be noted.: Note presence of marble pillar for future continuity | detonator -> STACKS OF CASH (Sc 1): Use Scene 1 Duffel Bags as detonator prop, and swap with one from Sc 1 Stacks of Cash | Glass doors -> Shattered: BOOM. The glass doors SHATTER.

flags.note: Detonator use and shattering glass doors. Potential for injury.

script_text:
Glass crunches under boots. TWENTY BYSTANDERS and POLICE               
             OFFICERS scatter for cover.                                            
                                                                                    
             FIVE VEHICLES dominate the street: FOUR POLICE CRUISERS                
             forming a barricade and a matte-black GETAWAY VAN.                     
                                                                                    
                       OFFICER RIVERA                                               
                                                                                    
                 DROP THE BAGS! HANDS IN THE AIR!                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax hurls a flash-bang. WHITE OUT.                                     
                                                                                    
             AT THE GETAWAY VAN                                                     
                                                                                    
             The side door slides open. Mira tosses her bags in. Jax                
             dives in after her as bullets PING off the armor.                      
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             The van screeches forward, fishtailing into the night.                 
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 Told you we’d make the exit.                                       
                                                                                    
                              FADE OUT.
description: Jax and Mira escape in a getaway van, pursued by police.
continuity_notes: Glass -> Polished Wood Floor (Sc 2): Use Scene 2 Polished Wood Floor | Bags -> Duffel Bags (Sc 1): Matches Sc 1 Duffel Bags | Police Cruisers -> POLISHED WOOD (Sc 2) and MAHOGANY COUNTER (Sc 2): Use Scene 2 Polished Wood and Mahogany Counter for cruisers | MAG-LOCKS -> Scene 3 MAG-LOCKS: Use Scene 3 MAG-LOCKS | Glass -> Shattered: Crunches under boots | Bags -> Tossed in the van: Mira tosses her bags in. Jax dives in after her

flags.note: High-complexity environment: large crowd (TWENTY BYSTANDERS), police officers, and vehicle coordination.
Firearms (bullets PING off the armor) and explosives (flash-bang).
Stunts: diving in after someone, fishtailing into the night.
